languages.text:
At the start of their turn, each enemy in the radius of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm makes WIL Save −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. On a failure, they consider the Servoskull Swarm a priority target until the end of their turn.
For each enemy in the radius, the Servoskull Swarm gains a {uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% bonus to Armor and Dodge.
This effect ends if the Servoskull Swarm is destroyed. Only one Signal effect can be active.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of their turn, each enemy in the radius of the {g|f:215d9f42b7e6435e9ed77337156e0fc3}Expanded{/g} Servoskull Swarm makes WIL Save −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. On a failure, they consider the Servoskull Swarm a priority target until the end of their turn.
For each enemy in the radius, the Servoskull Swarm gains a {uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% bonus to Armor and Dodge.
This effect ends if the Servoskull Swarm is destroyed. Only one Signal effect can be active.

languages.text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} penalty. Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
languages.original_text:
В начале своего {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}хода{/g} каждый противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняет проверку {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Воли{/g} на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g} со штрафом −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} и в случае провала считает рой сервочерепов {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}приоритетной целью{/g} до конца своего хода.
Пока длится эффект, {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}броня{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} роя сервочерепов увеличены на {uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% за каждого противника в области действия.
! Эффект этого сигнала длится, пока рой сервочерепов остается в строю или пока не использован другой сигнал.

traits.locale_text:
At the start of their turn, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} penalty. Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
В начале своего хода каждый противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} и в случае провала считает рой сервочерепов приоритетной целью до конца своего хода.
Пока длится эффект, броня и уклонение роя сервочерепов увеличены на {uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% за каждого противника в области действия.
! Эффект этого сигнала длится, пока рой сервочерепов остается в строю или пока не использован другой сигнал.

В начале своего хода каждый противник в радиусе 4 клеток от роя сервочерепов выполняет проверку Воли на сопротивление со штрафом −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} и в случае провала считает рой сервочерепов приоритетной целью до конца своего хода.
Пока длится эффект, броня и уклонение роя сервочерепов увеличены на {uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% за каждого противника в области действия.
! Эффект этого сигнала длится, пока рой сервочерепов остается в строю или пока не использован другой сигнал.

languages.text:
Zu Beginn ihrer {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Runde{/g} machen alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Gegner, deren Probe misslingt, betrachten den Servoschädel-Schwarm bis zum Ende ihres Zuges als {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
Solange der Signaleffekt anhält, erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungs-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichwert{/g} des Servoschädel-Schwarms für jeden anwesenden Gegner um +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} %.
! Dieser Signaleffekt dauert an, bis der Servoschädel-Schwarm zerstört wird oder eine andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Signalfähigkeit{/g} einsetzt.
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} penalty. Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Zu Beginn ihrer Runde machen alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm eine Widerstandsprobe auf Willenskraft mit einem Abzug von -{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Gegner, deren Probe misslingt, betrachten den Servoschädel-Schwarm bis zum Ende ihres Zuges als Prioritätsziel.
Solange der Signaleffekt anhält, erhöht sich der Rüstungs- und Ausweichwert des Servoschädel-Schwarms für jeden anwesenden Gegner um +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} %.
! Dieser Signaleffekt dauert an, bis der Servoschädel-Schwarm zerstört wird oder eine andere Signalfähigkeit einsetzt.

Zu Beginn ihrer Runde machen alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Gegner, deren Probe misslingt, betrachten den Servoschädel-Schwarm bis zum Ende ihres Zuges als {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
Solange der Signaleffekt anhält, erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungs-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichwert{/g} des Servoschädel-Schwarms für jeden anwesenden Gegner um +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} %.
! Dieser Signaleffekt dauert an, bis der Servoschädel-Schwarm zerstört wird oder eine andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Signalfähigkeit{/g} einsetzt.

Zu Beginn ihrer Runde machen alle Gegner in einem Radius von 4 Feldern um den Servoschädel-Schwarm eine {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} auf {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft{/g} mit einem Abzug von -{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Gegner, deren Probe misslingt, betrachten den Servoschädel-Schwarm bis zum Ende ihres Zuges als {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}Prioritätsziel{/g}.
Solange der Signaleffekt anhält, erhöht sich der {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Rüstungs-{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichwert{/g} des Servoschädel-Schwarms für jeden anwesenden Gegner um +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} %.
! Dieser Signaleffekt dauert an, bis der Servoschädel-Schwarm zerstört wird oder eine andere {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Signalfähigkeit{/g} einsetzt.

languages.text:
Au début de leur {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g}, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Ceux qui échouent considèrent l'essaim de servocrânes comme leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} jusqu'à la fin de leur tour.
Tant que cet effet de signal persiste, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} de l'essaim de servocrânes augmentent de +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} % par ennemi dans la zone.
! Cet effet de signal dure jusqu'à ce que l'essaim de servocrânes soit détruit ou utilise une autre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de signal.
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} penalty. Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Au début de leur tour, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes doivent réussir un test de résistance de Force mentale avec une pénalité de −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Ceux qui échouent considèrent l'essaim de servocrânes comme leur cible prioritaire jusqu'à la fin de leur tour.
Tant que cet effet de signal persiste, l'Armure et l'Esquive de l'essaim de servocrânes augmentent de +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} % par ennemi dans la zone.
! Cet effet de signal dure jusqu'à ce que l'essaim de servocrânes soit détruit ou utilise une autre capacité de signal.

Au début de leur tour, tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 4 cases autour de l'essaim de servocrânes doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Force mentale{/g} avec une pénalité de −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Ceux qui échouent considèrent l'essaim de servocrânes comme leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} jusqu'à la fin de leur tour.
Tant que cet effet de signal persiste, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} de l'essaim de servocrânes augmentent de +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} % par ennemi dans la zone.
! Cet effet de signal dure jusqu'à ce que l'essaim de servocrânes soit détruit ou utilise une autre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de signal.

Ceux qui échouent considèrent l'essaim de servocrânes comme leur {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}cible prioritaire{/g} jusqu'à la fin de leur tour.
Tant que cet effet de signal persiste, l'{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}Armure{/g} et l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Esquive{/g} de l'essaim de servocrânes augmentent de +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} % par ennemi dans la zone.
! Cet effet de signal dure jusqu'à ce que l'essaim de servocrânes soit détruit ou utilise une autre {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} de signal.

languages.text:
所有距离伺服头骨集群4格内的敌人，在各自的{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}开始时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}减值。所有未能通过检定的敌人都会将伺服头骨集群视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至该名敌人的回合结束。
当此信号效果生效时，范围内每有一名敌人，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}就提高{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}%。
！此信号的效果始终持续，直到伺服头骨集群被摧毁或使用其他信号{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} penalty. Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
所有距离伺服头骨集群4格内的敌人，在各自的回合开始时，都需要进行意志抗性检定，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}减值。所有未能通过检定的敌人都会将伺服头骨集群视为优先目标，效果持续至该名敌人的回合结束。
当此信号效果生效时，范围内每有一名敌人，伺服头骨集群的护甲与闪避就提高{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}%。
！此信号的效果始终持续，直到伺服头骨集群被摧毁或使用其他信号能力。

所有距离伺服头骨集群4格内的敌人，在各自的回合开始时，都需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}，且在此次检定中承受-{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}减值。所有未能通过检定的敌人都会将伺服头骨集群视为{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}优先目标{/g}，效果持续至该名敌人的回合结束。
当此信号效果生效时，范围内每有一名敌人，伺服头骨集群的{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}护甲{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}就提高{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}%。
！此信号的效果始终持续，直到伺服头骨集群被摧毁或使用其他信号{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}。

languages.text:
Al principio de su {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}, cada enemigo en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos hace una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Los enemigos que fallan la prueba consideran al enjambre de servocráneos su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} hasta el final de su turno.
Mientras dure este efecto de señal, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del enjambre de servocráneos aumenta en +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} % por cada enemigo en la zona.
! Este efecto de señal dura hasta que el enjambre de servocráneos queda destruido o usa otra {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de señal.
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} penalty. Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

traits.locale_text:
Al principio de su turno, cada enemigo en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos hace una prueba de fortaleza de Voluntad con una penalización de −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Los enemigos que fallan la prueba consideran al enjambre de servocráneos su objetivo prioritario hasta el final de su turno.
Mientras dure este efecto de señal, la armadura y la esquiva del enjambre de servocráneos aumenta en +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} % por cada enemigo en la zona.
! Este efecto de señal dura hasta que el enjambre de servocráneos queda destruido o usa otra capacidad de señal.

Al principio de su turno, cada enemigo en un radio de 4 casillas del enjambre de servocráneos hace una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g} con una penalización de −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}. Los enemigos que fallan la prueba consideran al enjambre de servocráneos su {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}objetivo prioritario{/g} hasta el final de su turno.
Mientras dure este efecto de señal, la {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armadura{/g} y la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} del enjambre de servocráneos aumenta en +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} % por cada enemigo en la zona.
! Este efecto de señal dura hasta que el enjambre de servocráneos queda destruido o usa otra {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} de señal.

languages.text:
{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各敵は−{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}のペナルティで{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を受けなければならない。失敗すると、各敵はそのターン終了までサーヴォスカル・スウォームを{g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}優先ターゲット{/g}とみなす。
このシグナル効果が続く間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}アーマー{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}はそのエリアにいる敵につき+{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}%上昇する。
！このシグナル効果はサーヴォスカル・スウォームが破壊されるか、別のシグナル{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用するまで継続する。
languages.original_text:
At the start of their {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}, each enemy in a 4-cell radius around the servo-skull swarm makes a {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willpower{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g} with a −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} penalty. Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.

このシグナル効果が続く間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームのアーマーと回避はそのエリアにいる敵につき+{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}%上昇する。

ターン開始時、サーヴォスカル・スウォームの半径4セルの各敵は−{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}のペナルティで意志力抵抗判定を受けなければならない。失敗すると、各敵はそのターン終了までサーヴォスカル・スウォームを優先ターゲットとみなす。
このシグナル効果が続く間、サーヴォスカル・スウォームのアーマーと回避はそのエリアにいる敵につき+{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}%上昇する。

languages.text:
Hizmelet sürüsünün etrafındaki 4 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan her düşman, {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turu{/g} başladığında −{uip|WILSave|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} ceza puanına sahip bir {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}İrade{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testine{/g} girer. Başarısız olan düşmanlar, turları bitene dek hizmelet sürüsünü {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}öncelikli hedefleri{/g} olarak görür.
Hizmelet sürüsünün {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}zırh{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} değerleri, alandaki her düşman için +%{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663} artar. Bu etki, sinyal etkisi bitene dek sürer.
! Bu sinyal etkisi, hizmelet sürüsü imha edilene veya başka bir sinyal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyeti{/g} kullanana dek sürer.
languages.original_text:

Each enemy that fails considers the servo-skull swarm their {g|Encyclopedia:PriorityTarget}priority target{/g} until the end of their turn.
While this signal effect lasts, the servo-skull swarm's {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerArmourGlossary}armour{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} are increased by +{uip|ArmorBonus|42ed520aeaf2480ba43afc9290b36663}% for each enemy in the area.
! This signal effect lasts until the servo-skull swarm is destroyed or uses another signal {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g}.
